testcase.classname: As a registered user (student/parent), I want to have access to the login page from the homepage
testcase.name: On the "ufpassword" (forgot password) page, it should be verified that users can enter
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the "url" address....................................passed When The user clicks on the Login button....................................passed And The user clicks on forgot password link.................................passed Then The user verifies that they can enter their email addresses in the relavent textbox on the ufpassword page to reset their password and select the appropriate panels..passed
